code:
import axios from'axios';const API='/api/cart';// Configure axios to send credentials with all requests
axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;const cartService={getCart:async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API));return res.data.cart;},addToCart:async function(productId){let quantity=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;const res=await axios.post("".concat(API,"/add"),{productId,quantity});return res.data.cart;},updateCartItem:async(productId,quantity)=>{const res=await axios.put("".concat(API,"/update"),{productId,quantity});return res.data.cart;},removeFromCart:async productId=>{const res=await axios.delete("".concat(API,"/remove/").concat(productId));return res.data.cart;},clearCart:async()=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API,"/clear"));return res.data.cart||[];}};export default cartService;
